member.name: T:SqlStreamStore.CheckSchemaResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a schema check.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.CheckSchemaResult.CurrentVersion
member.summary: The version of the schema checked.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.CheckSchemaResult.ExpectedVersion
member.summary: The expected version for this version of MsSqlStreamStore to be compatible with.

member.param: The current version of the schema.
The expected version of the schema.

member.name: M:SqlStreamStore.CheckSchemaResult.IsMatch
member.summary: Checks to see if the schema version matches.
member.returns: True if the version match, otherwise False.

member.name: T:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStore
member.summary: Represents a Micrsoft SQL Server stream store implementation.

member.param: A settings class to configur this instance.

member.summary: Creates a scheme to hold stream

member.name: M:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStore.CheckSchema(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.returns: A representing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStore.DropAll(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Drops all tables related to this store instance.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.CreateStreamStoreNotifier
member.summary: Allows overrding of the stream store notifier. The default implementation creates

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.Schema
member.summary: MsSqlStream store supports stores in a single database through the useage of schema. This is useful if you want to contain multiple bounded contexts in a single database. Alternative is use a database per bounded context, which may be more appropriate for larger stores.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.MetadataMaxAgeCacheExpire
member.summary: To help with perf, the max age of messages in a stream are cached. It is not expected that a streams max age metadata to be changed frequently. Here we hold on to the max age for the specified timespan. The default is 1 minute.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.MetadataMaxAgeCacheMaxSize
member.summary: To help with perf, the max age of messages in a stream are cached. It is not expected that a streams max age metadata to be changed frequently. Here we define how many items are cached. The default value is 10000.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.GetUtcNow
member.summary: A delegate to return the current UTC now. Used in testing to control timestamps and time related operations.

member.name: P:SqlStreamStore.MsSqlStreamStoreSettings.LogName
member.summary: The log name used for the any log messages.
